review: Google Chromecast HDMI Streaming Media Player is a great device to have.  It is very easy to set up.  Just plug it in and control it with the device of your choice.  I have set up the app on my iphone, computer and ipad and it works great on all three.  I have Amazon Prime and the streaming is simple to use.  When my grandchildren visit I can stream a movie for them in another room and everyone is happy.  I also have used the Google Chromecast with Netflix.  This device does what it says it does and you will not be disappointed in it's capabilities.
